author: Geoffrey Morgan
title: Shockproofing Canada: Why the Keystone pipeline is just the start of making us energy self-sufficient
description: 'This is our hedge that we get at least one major project built. That will ensure the flexibility for the future': Alberta Premier Jason Kenney
content: Canada needs to become more secure by becoming more self-sufficient. In a new series Strong & Free: Shockproofing Canada the Post examines how a country made wealthy by globalization and trade can also protect itself against pandemics and other unknown fu… [+13494 chars]
